Title: Long live the mother country -- Carry on the revolutionary tradition to strive for the rejuvenation of the nation -- Celebrate the 35th anniversary of the founding of the PRC
Designer: Huang Zongrui (黄宗瑞)Yang Ming (杨明)Li Zhiguo (李志国)Zhang Zhaonian (张兆年)
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Theme: 1 October, National Day of the People's Republic of China
